resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated. For example exports of soy cake and soy oil are converted to soybean equivalents in the areas of production, where farmers are just producing beans.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.

resizeBy.name: DEFORESTATION_V2
resizeBy.label: Territorial deforestation
resizeBy.description: Total deforestation per municipality for a given year (ha). Calculated only for forested and wooded biomes - the Amazon, Cerrado and Atlantic Forest. Clearance of native vegetation in Brazil´s other biomes (Caatinga, Pantanal and Pampas) is not considered as deforestation in this indicator.

resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated. For example exports of soy cake and soy oil are converted to soybean equivalents in the areas of production, where farmers are just producing beans.

resizeBy.name: POTENTIAL_SOY_DEFORESTATION_V2
resizeBy.label: Maximum soy deforestation
resizeBy.description: Maximum potential soy-related deforestation (ha). Calculated as the maximum deforestation in the year prior to soy being harvested that could be attributable to soy expansion for that harvest. As an example, in a municipality with 1000 ha of soy expansion between 2014-2015, but only 400 ha of deforestation in 2014, the potential soy-related deforestation during 2014 could not be more than 400 ha. Calculated only for forested and wooded biomes - the Amazon, Cerrado and Atlantic Forest. Clearance of native vegetation in Brazil´s other biomes (Caatinga, Pantanal and Pampas) is not considered as deforestation in this indicator.

resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated. For example exports of soy cake and soy oil are converted to soybean equivalents in the areas of production, where farmers are just producing beans.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.

resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated. For example exports of soy cake and soy oil are converted to soybean equivalents in the areas of production, where farmers are just producing beans.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.

resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated. For example exports of soy cake and soy oil are converted to soybean equivalents in the areas of production, where farmers are just producing beans.

resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated. For example exports of soy cake and soy oil are converted to soybean equivalents in the areas of production, where farmers are just producing beans.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.

recolorBy.name: FOREST_500
recolorBy.label: Forest 500 score
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows based on the Forest 500 index, which ranks traders according to the strength of their sustainability commitments.

recolorBy.name: WATER_SCARCITY
recolorBy.label: Water scarcity
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows based on level of criticality of water stress (1-7), calculated as the median water stress level per municipality, in terms of percentage of available blue water.

recolorBy.name: PROTECTED_DEFICIT_PERC
recolorBy.label: Forest code deficit
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows based on area of land in permanent protected areas and legal reserves that must be restored or compensated for (legal reserve only) to achieve compliance with the Brazilian Forest Code - as a percentage of the total area of private land. Based on 2017 analysis.

recolorBy.name: SMALLHOLDERS
recolorBy.label: Smallholder dominance
recolorBy.description: Colour the supply chain flows according to density of smallholders, defined as the proportion of total property area in the hands of legally defined family farmers versus the total area of all properties. Based on 2006 census data.

recolorBy.name: BIOME
recolorBy.label: Biome
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows in accordance with the biome of the sourcing region.

recolorBy.name: ZERO_DEFORESTATION
recolorBy.label: Zero deforestation commitment (exporters)
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows based on whether different soy traders have zero deforestation commitments or not.

resizeBy.name: DEFORESTATION_V2
resizeBy.label: Territorial deforestation
resizeBy.description: Total deforestation per municipality for a given year (ha). Calculated only for forested and wooded biomes - the Amazon, Cerrado and Atlantic Forest. Clearance of native vegetation in Brazil´s other biomes (Caatinga, Pantanal and Pampas) is not considered as deforestation in this indicator.

resizeBy.name: AGROSATELITE_SOY_DEFOR_
resizeBy.label: Soy deforestation
resizeBy.description: Annual deforestation due to direct conversion for soy (ha), currently only in the Cerrado and Amazon. This deforestation rate is allocated to the actors along the supply chain in proportion to the volume of a soy that they export from a given jurisdiction relative to the total production of soy (by all actors) in the same jurisdiction.

resizeBy.name: LAND_USE
resizeBy.label: Land use
resizeBy.description: Area of land being used to produce the traded commodity. Based on exported volumes and yield values per jurisdiction.

resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated. For example exports of soy cake and soy oil are converted to soybean equivalents in the areas of production, where farmers are just producing beans.

resizeBy.name: POTENTIAL_SOY_DEFORESTATION_V2
resizeBy.label: Maximum soy deforestation
resizeBy.description: Maximum potential soy-related deforestation (ha). Calculated as the maximum deforestation in the year prior to soy being harvested that could be attributable to soy expansion for that harvest. Calculated only for forested and wooded biomes - the Amazon, Cerrado and Atlantic Forest - and the Pantanal. Clearance of native vegetation in Brazil´s other biomes (Caatinga and Pampas) is not considered as deforestation in this indicator.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.
